page.title: 12CONVERSATION IN SCOTS
page.content: Twa auld fish wifies hud bin si'un blethrin' fur twa oors 'boot guttin' fishies fan they wiz bairns.I o'er heard em say thit they used ti wirk fae five in thu morn tae echt at nicht. I stapped tae listen. They wirkit at the Broch til they wiz flitted tae Eberdeen.Ane o'the wifies wiz wince ootut sea fan a great muckle whale skelped the traaler fit almist o'er turned,and they wid a hiv bin drooned.The ither een sed thut she hid jist hid a bilin' cupa tae wea rowie un cheese undithud bin afa fine. "Fit time izit?"ain asked."It must be getin' on." "Here,div yi wint ti come roon thu nicht fur a Burun's supper?We'll hae huggus,neeps,tatties,scirly and a wee dram." "Thatulbe rare.See yuiz at the back o sivin." Awa they wint the gither.
